articles.description: Sachin Tendulkar and Sir Garfield Sobers were in attendance for the second ODI between India and England at Lord's.
articles.content: The second ODI between India and England was a star-studded affair with the likes of Sachin Tendulkar, Sourav Ganguly, MS Dhoni and Suresh Raina in attendance. However, it was a bad day at the office… [+1295 chars]
